testsuite.name: src.main.java.TestMain
testsuite.system-out:
?[H?[2J COMMAND NAME | COMMAND FUNCTION | COMMAND OPTIONS
add -x add to notebook -t (add a note by typing text) -d (add a note through dictation) -e (edit an existing note by adding to it)
COMMAND NAME | COMMAND FUNCTION | COMMAND OPTIONS
delete -x delete from notebook -i (delete a specific identifier) -x (delete a note from the notebook)
COMMAND NAME | COMMAND FUNCTION | COMMAND OPTIONS
search -x search in notebook -w (returns the filenames of notes containing an entered identifier) -a (returns all notes which contain one+ identifiers of a certain type) -o (returns notes organized by identifiers of a certain type) -l (returns list of all identifiers of a certain type) -t (returns notes organized in topological order) -s (returns sentences containing a given identifier)
COMMAND NAME | COMMAND FUNCTION
filepath give notes location via filepath
COMMAND NAME | COMMAND FUNCTION
quit terminate program
Please enter your ABSOLUTE filepath: File not found.
Enter command below, or for help type 'help' ?[H?[2J COMMAND NAME | COMMAND FUNCTION | COMMAND OPTIONS
add -x add to notebook -t (add a note by typing text) -d (add a note through dictation) -e (edit an existing note by adding to it)
COMMAND NAME | COMMAND FUNCTION | COMMAND OPTIONS
delete -x delete from notebook -i (delete a specific identifier) -x (delete a note from the notebook)
COMMAND NAME | COMMAND FUNCTION | COMMAND OPTIONS
search -x search in notebook -w (returns the filenames of notes containing an entered identifier) -a (returns all notes which contain one+ identifiers of a certain type) -o (returns notes organized by identifiers of a certain type) -l (returns list of all identifiers of a certain type) -t (returns notes organized in topological order) -s (returns sentences containing a given identifier)

filepath give notes location via filepath
